json.text: >> Announcer: THE FOLLOWING PROGRAM IS
SPONSORED BY CBN. >> Wendy: COMING UP...A
BOY IS STABBED IN THE FACE WITH A BARBECUE SKEWER.
>> I WAS SCARED FOR ABOUT 30 SECONDS, SCREAMING MY
HEAD OFF. >> Wendy: WATCH HOW HE
IS RUSHED TO THE E.R., AND EMERGES AS A WALKING
MIRACLE. >> THE HAND OF GOD WAS ON
MY SON. >> Wendy: PLUS...THE
HIPPIE TURNED PASTOR AT HARVEST CHURCH.
GREG LAURIE LOOKS BACK AT THE JESUS REVOLUTION.
ON TODAY'S "700 CLUB." *
>> Gordon: WELL, WELCOME TO "THE 700 CLUB."
TODAY WE'RE JOINED IN OUR STUDIO BY OUR PARTNERS WHO
COME FROM ALL PARTS OF THE COUNTRY TO SUPPORT THE
MINISTRY OF CBN. BUT FIRST IN THE NEWS,
BRETT KAVANAUGH, HE HAD A HEARING YESTERDAY.
AND HIS NOMINATION TO THE SUPREME COURT IS NOW IN
THE HANDS OF THE U.S. SENATE.
AND AFTER THURSDAY'S HISTORIC HEARING, IT IS
NOW UP TO A FEW SENATORS FROM BOTH PARTIES TO
DECIDE IF HE'LL BE CONFIRMED.
>> Terry: WELL, THE HEARING BEGAN WITH AN
EMOTIONAL ACCUSATION OF SEXUAL ASSAULT FROM
DR. CHRISTINE BLASEY FORD, FOLLOWED BY A VEHEMENT
DENIAL FROM JUDGE KAVANAUGH.
WE HAVE TWO REPORTS FROM CBN NEWS, BEGINNING WITH
ABIGAIL ROBERTSON, ON THURSDAY'S POWERFUL
TESTIMONY. >> Reporter: IN A
HEARING THAT GRIPPED THE NATION ON THURSDAY,
DR. CHRISTINE BLASEY FORD AND JUDGE BRETT KAVANAUGH
BOTH GAVE EMOTIONAL TESTIMONIES ABOUT WHAT
THEY REMEMBER FROM 1982. >> DR. FORD, WITH WHAT
DEGREE OF CERTAINTY DO YOU BELIEVE BRETT KAVANAUGH
ASSAULTED YOU? >> 100%.
>> Reporter: DR. FORD DESCRIBED IN DETAIL WHAT
SHE BELIEVES HAPPENED. >> BRETT GROPED ME AND
TRIED TO TAKE OFF MY CLOTHES.
I BELIEVED HE WAS GOING TO RAPE ME.
>> Reporter: AND SAID SHE HAS NO DOUBTS IT WAS
BRETT KAVANAUGH AND MARK JUDGE WHO WERE IN THE ROOM
AND ATTACKED HER. >> WHAT IS THE STRONGEST
MEMORY YOU HAVE. >> THE LAUGHTER BETWEEN
THE TWO. >> Reporter: AND THEN
JUDGE KAVANAUGH TOOK HIS TURN, WHERE HE
CATEGORICALLY DENIED HER CLAIM.
>> I'M HERE TODAY TO TELL THE TRUTH.
I'VE NEVER SEXUALLY ASSAULTED ANYONE, NOT IN
HIGH SCHOOL, NOT IN COLLEGE, NOT EVER.
>> Reporter: AND HE SAID WHILE HE BELIEVES
SOMETHING MAY HAVE HAPPENED TO DR. FORD, HE
DID NOT DO IT. >> THE OTHER NIGHT ASHLEY
AND MY DAUGHTER, LIZA, SAID THEIR PRAYERS.
AND LITTLE LIZA, ALL OF 10 YEARS OLD...SAID TO
ASHLEY, WE SHOULD PRAY FOR THE WOMAN.
>> Reporter: KAVANAUGH TOLD HOW THIS PROCESS HAS
DESTROYED HIS FAMILY AND GOOD NAME, CONSEQUENCES
THAT WILL FOLLOW THEM FOR DECADES.
>> I LOVE COACHING MORE THAN ANYTHING I'VE EVER
DONE IN MY WHOLE LIFE. BUT THANKS TO WHAT SOME OF
YOU ON THIS SIDE OF THE COMMITTEE HAVE UNLEASHED,
I MAY NEVER BE ABLE TO COACH AGAIN.
>> Reporter: KAVANAUGH CONFRONTED DEMOCRATS HEAD
ON. >> THIS CONFIRMATION
PROCESS HAS BECOME A NATIONAL DISGRACE.
>> Reporter: JUDGE KAVANAUGH ASSURED SENATORS
NO MATTER WHAT, HE IS NOT BACKING OUT OF THIS
PROCESS. >> YOU MAY DEFEAT ME IN
THE FINAL VOTE, BUT YOU'LL NEVER GET ME TO QUIT,
NEVER. >> Reporter: AND NOW TO
JENNIFER WISHON FOR WASHINGTON'S REACTION TO
THE HEARINGS. >> Jennifer: ABIGAIL, AS
SOON AS THEY GOT THE CHANCE, SOME REPUBLICANS
UNLEASHED THEIR ANGER ON DEMOCRATS FOR DRAGGING
JUDGE KAVANAUGH AND HIS FAMILY THROUGH THE MUD IN
AN EFFORT THEY SAY TO SCORE CHEAP POLITICAL
POINTS AHEAD OF THE MID-TERMS.
>> IF YOU WANTED AN F.B.I. INVESTIGATION, YOU COULD
HAVE COME TO US. WHAT YOU WANT TO DO IS
DESTROY THIS GUY'S LIFE, HOLD THIS SEAT OPEN, AND
HOPE YOU WIN IN 2020. YOU'VE SAID THAT.
THIS IS THE MOST UNETHICAL SHAM SINCE I'VE BEEN IN
POLITICS. >> THIS IS A NATIONAL
DISGRACE, THE WAY YOU'RE BEING TREATED.
>> Reporter: PASTOR ROBERT JEFFERS, WHO SITS
ON THE PRESIDENT'S EVANGELICAL ADVISORY BOARD
SAYS DEMOCRATS DEMONSTRATED HOW FAR
THEY'LL GO TO PROTECT ABORTION RIGHTS.
WHEN WE ALL KNOW THEIR NUMBER ONE OBJECTION TO
JUDGE KAVANAUGH IS HE MIGHT RESTRICT IN SOME WAY
THE MURDER OF 700,000 FEMALES EVERY YEAR IN THE
WOMB THROUGH ABORTION. BUT EVEN IF KAVANAUGH IS
CONFIRMED, DEMOCRATS BELIEVE DR. FORD SERVED AS
A CREDIBLE WITNESS WHO WILL ENERGIZE THEIR BASE
COME NOVEMBER. >> SHE IS CREDIBLE, CALM.
SHE TOLD US SHE WAS TERRIFIED, BUT I THOUGHT
SHE HANDLED THE QUESTIONS PROFESSIONALLY AND
HONESTLY. >> Reporter: APPEARING
ON CBN'S "FAITH NATION," KALEIGH MACENANI PRAISED
THE WAY THEY HANDLED THE ACCUSATION.
>> HE BELIEVES SOMETHING TERRIBLE COULD HAVE
HAPPENED TOWARDS HER, BUT IT JUST WASN'T HIM WHO DID
IT. HE SWORE BEFORE GOD.
>> Reporter: A RELIEVED PRESIDENT TRUMP TWEETED:
"JUDGE KAVANAUGH SHOWED AMERICA EXACTLY WHY I
NOMINATED HIM." THE SENATE JUDICIARY
COMMITTEE IS EXPECTED TO ADVANCE JUDGE KAVANAUGH'S
NOMINATION TO THE FULL SENATE, AND PROCEDURAL
ACTION OVER THE WEEKEND WILL SET UP A POSSIBLE
CONFIRMATION VOTE AS EARLY AS TUESDAY.
JENNIFER WISHON, CBN NEWS, WASHINGTON.
>> Gordon: WELL, WE'LL SEE.
AND WE'LL BE REPORTING LATER ON HOW THAT VOTE
GOES. IS THIS GOING TO BE A
CLARENCE THOMAS CONFIRMATION, WHERE THE
NOMINEE TAKES THE HIT AND ULTIMATELY ENDS UP ON THE
SUPREME COURT? OR IS THIS GOING TO BE A
ROBERT BORK MOMENT, WHERE THESE NOMINATIONS KNOCK
HIM OUT. AND THEN WE'RE INTO CAN
ANOTHER JUSTICE BE CONFIRMED?
ONE OF THE CASUALTIES HERE, THOUGH, PEOPLE JUST
LIKE ME, OLDER WHITE MEN -- AND I'M NOT SURE
WE'RE EVEN QUALIFIED ANYMORE OR EVEN ALLOWED TO
SPEAK ON THIS. SO I'M GOING TO TURN TO
TERRY, AND SAY, TERRY, HELP OLDER WHITE MEN OUT?
WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT THIS?
[LAUGHTER] >> Terry: WELL, I
THOUGHT IT WAS RIVETING BUT PAINFULLY RIVETING.
I JUST WANT TO SAY THIS MORNING OR TODAY, I WANT
TO SEND A VERY LARGE BOUQUET TO LINDSEY GRAHAM,
WHO WAS RELIEV RELIEF IN THE MIDDLE OF THE WHOLE MESS.
[APPLAUSE] >> Terry: IT IS VERY
OBVIOUS TO ME SOMETHING TERRIBLE DID HAPPEN TO
THIS WOMAN, AND I PRAY SHE FINDS PEACE WITH THAT.
WHAT THIS FAMILY HAS GONE THROUGH, JUDGE KAVANAUGH'S
FAMILY, IS BEYOND THE PAIL.
I CAN'T IMAGINE, BUT THE FACT THAT HIS 10-YEAR-OLD
DAUGHTER SAYS, I THINK WE SHOULD PRAY FOR THE WOMAN
SPEAKS TO THEIR VALUE. I WANT TO SAY TO HIM,
THANK YOU FOR NOT CAVING. THANK YOU FOR NOT GIVING
UP, FOR STANDING STRONG, AND JUST DELIVERING THE
MESSAGE. >> Gordon: I'M GETTING
PHONE CALLS WHERE THIS WHOLE EPISODE HAS BEEN SO
MUCH DOMINATING THE NEWS, AND IT IS LITERALLY
RIPPING THE SCAB OFF OF TRAUMATIC EVENTS FOR
WOMEN. AND YOU LOOK AT THE
SURVEYS, AND THE PERCENTAGE IS JUST HUGE IN
OUR CULTURE, OF WOMEN WHO HAVE BEEN ASSAULTED.
>> Terry: YOU KNOW, MY CONCERN ABOUT THE WAY THIS
HAS BEEN HANDLED BY LIBERALS WHO HAVE USED IT
FOR POLITICAL PURPOSE IS THAT SOMETHING VALID, LIKE
#MeTOO MOVEMENT, WHERE WOMEN HAVE BEEN PUT IN
COMPROMISING SITUATIONS, REALLY HAS THE PLUG PULLED
ON IT BECAUSE THIS ISN'T TRUE.
THIS IS AN ALLEGATION. THERE IS NO FACT.
THERE IS NO PROOF OF ANY OF THIS.
BUT I DO THINK IT TAINTS THE VERY REAL STRUGGLE
THAT SOME WOMEN HAVE HAD, THAT IS LEGITIMATE.
AND SOMETIMES WE DO SOMETHING FOR THE WRONG
REASON, AND IT WINDS UP COMING AROUND AND KICKING
US ON THE BACK SIDE IN ANOTHER LEGITIMATE AREA.
AND SO I THINK THAT'S YET TO BE SEEN IN THIS.
EVEN POLITICALLY. YOU KNOW, WE'VE SEEN THAT
HAPPEN BEFORE, THAT SOME THINGS HAPPEN POLITICALLY,
AND THEN THE NEXT PARTY COMES INTO A POSITION OF
POWER OR AUTHORITY, AND THEY HAVE TO LIVE WITH THE
REPERCUSSIONS AND RAMIFICATIONS OF THEIR OWN
CHOICES. WE COULD SEE THAT HAPPEN
DOWN THE ROAD. >> Gordon: I THINK WE'VE
GOTTEN SO DIVIDED, HOW CAN WE EVER EVEN COME TOGETHER
AGAIN. THE EXTREMES HAVE GOTTEN
SO EXTREME. CAN WE EVER BE ONE NATION
INDIVISIBLE? IS THAT EVEN POSSIBLE?
BUT LET'S TAKE INTO ACCOUNT AND LET'S REMEMBER
WHAT A 10-YEAR-OLD GIRL SAID, LET US PRAY.
LET US PRAY. AND IN THAT, REMEMBER THE
WORDS OF JESUS. HE ASKS US TO LOVE OUR
ENEMIES. SO REGARDLESS OF WHICH
SIDE YOU'RE ON HERE, WHO YOU CONSIDER AN ENEMY,
THESE ARE THE WORDS OF JESUS.
AND THEY APPLY TO ALL PEOPLE EVERYWHERE.
AND HE TELLS US, LOVE OUR ENEMIES.
DO GOOD TO THOSE WHO PERSECUTE YOU.
THESE ARE WORDS TO LIVE BY.
IN OUR CULTURE TODAY, WE'RE GOING TO FIND THESE
ARE GOING TO BE TOUGH WORDS TO LIVE BY, BUT THE
COMMANDMENT STAYS THE SAME: LOVE YOUR ENEMY; DO
GOOD TO THOSE WHO PERSECUTE YOU.
>>> IN OTHER NEWS, ISRAELI PRIME MINISTER BENJAMIN
NETANYAHU HAS WARNED THE UNITED NATIONS IRAN IS
STILL WORKING ON A NUCLEAR WEAPON.
EFREM GRAHAM HAS THAT STORY FROM THE CBN
NEWSROOM. >> Efrem: GORDON, JUST A
FEW MONTHS AFTER NETANYAHU REVEALED THAT ISRAEL HAD
DISCOVERED A SECRET IRANIAN ATOMIC AR ARCHIVES,
HE TOLD THE UNITED NATIONS ON THURSDAY THAT IRAN HAS
ANOTHER FACILITY, WHICH HE CALLED IRAN'S SECRET
ATOMIC WAREHOUSE. NETANYAHU SAYS IRAN HAS
NOT DESTROYED THE TWO LOCATIONS BECAUSE IT WANTS
TO BUILD A NUCLEAR WEAPON. >> IN FACT, THEY PLAN TO
USE BOTH OF THESE SITES IN A FEW YEARS, WHEN THE TIME
WOULD BE RIGHT TO BREAK OUT TO THE ATOM BOMB.
BUT, LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, REST ASSURED THAT WON'T
HAPPEN. IT WON'T HAPPEN BECAUSE
WHAT IRAN HIDES ISRAEL WILL FIND.
>> Efrem: IRAN DENIED THE ALLEGATIONS.
>>> AT LEAST 91 PEOPLE ARE DEAD AND HUNDREDS OF
OTHERS ARE INJURED AFTER A POWERFUL EARTHQUAKE HIT IN
INDONESIA. OFFICIALS ISSUED A TSUNAMI
WARNING, BUT IT HAS BEEN LIFTED, ALTHOUGH A TSUNAMI
DID HIT ONE TOWN. THE 7.5 MAGNITUDE QUAKE
FOLLOWED A 6.1 QUAKE THAT IT EARLIER TODAY.
THE QUAKE HAS BEEN FOLLOWED BY STRONG AFTER
SHOCKS. A LOCAL DISASTER OFFICIAL
SAYS MANY HOUSES HAVE COLLAPSED.
INDONESIA IS PRONE TO EARTHQUAKES BECAUSE IT IS
LOCATED IN THE RING OF FIRE.
THAT'S AN ARK OF VOLCANOS AND FALT LINES AROUND THE
PACIFIC. >>> IT WAS A POPULAR BOOK,
AND NOW IT IS GOING TO THE BIG SCREEN.
"THE TRUMP PROPHECY" LIVES UP TO ITS NAME, TELLING
THE STORY OF A MAN WHO HAD A REVELATION THAT TRUMP
WOULD BE PRESIDENT SEVERAL YEARS BEFORE HE WAS
ELECTED. BUT AS WENDY GRIFFITH
SHOWS US, THE MOVIE HASN'T BEEN WITHOUT CONTROVERSY.
>> YOUR JOB AS A FIREMAN IS TO REACT CALMLY.
>> BUT WHAT I SAW LAST NIGHT SCARED ME SO MUCH.
>> Wendy: THE TRUMP PROPHECY MOVIE IS THE
STORY OF FORMER FIREFIGHTER MARK TAYLOR,
WHO SAYS HE RECEIVED A SPECIAL MESSAGE FROM GOD
IN 2011 THAT THEN BUSINESSMAN DONALD TRUMP
WAS HEADED TO THE WHITE HOUSE.
PRODUCER RICK ELDRIDGE SAID HE WANT SURE HE
WANTED TWASN'T SURE HEWANTED TO DO THE MOV IE. >> I KNEW IT WOULD BE
CONTROVERSIAL, BUT I KNEW WE HAD A NATION THAT
NEEDED TO HEAR ABOUT GOD'S INTERVENTION IN OUR
COUNTRY. >> Wendy: THE MOVIE
RELIVES THE NIGHT MARK RECEIVED WHAT HE CALLS THE
COMMANDER IN CHIEF PROPHECY.
>> I DIDN'T KNOW MUCH ABOUT DONALD TRUMP.
ALL OF A SUDDEN I HEARD THE LORD SAYING YOU'RE
HEARING THE VOICE OF A PRESIDENT.
>> IT IS REALLY ABOUT A COMMON MAN HEARING FROM
THE LORD, AND BEING GIVEN WISDOM AND ADVICE FROM
FELLOW BELIEVERS TO PRAY ABOUT THAT.
>> Wendy: ONE OF THOSE BELIEVERS WAS MARY CUL
CULBERT, WIFE OF DR. CULBERT, WHO WAS
TREATING HIM FOR ILLNESS. AND SHE STARTED A
NATIONWIDE PRAYER MOVEMENT FOR THE PRESIDENTIAL
ELECTION. A MOVEMENT THAT BECAME THE
KEY PART OF THE MOVIE. >> THERE IS A MANDATE FOR
US AS BELIEVERS TO PRAY FOR THOSE IN AUTHORITY
OVER US. THAT'S A DEEPER MESSAGE WE
REALLY EMPHASIZE IN THE MOVIE.
>> Wendy: THE FILM WAS MADE WITH THE HELP OF
LIBERTY UNIVERSITY FILM STUDENTS, DESPITE THE FACT
THAT THOUSANDS OF STUDENTS SIGNED A PETITION SAYING
THEY DIDN'T WANT THE MOVIE MADE.
AND Facebook WAS ALSO NOT A FAN, AND TEMPORARILY
BLOCKED ALL ADS, CLAIMING THE MOVIE WAS TOO
POLITICAL. BUT NELSON SAYS MOST
PEOPLE WERE JUST REACTING TO THE "T" WORD.
>> THEY GET SQWIRMY WHEN THEY HEAR THE WORDS TRUMP
AND GOD TOGETHER. BECAUSE THEY THINK SOMEHOW
IT IS LESSENING, I THINK, WHO GOD IS BY EVEN
MENTIONING HIS NAME WITH TRUMP.
I THINK, GOODNESS, AREN'T WE ALL GLAD THAT'S NOT HOW
WE FEEL ABOUT OURSELVES? >> Wendy: WENDY
GRIFFITH, CBN NEWS. >> Efrem: THE TRUMP
PROPHECY IS IN MOVIE THEATERS FOR TWO NIGHTS
ONLY, OCTOBER 2nd AND 4th.
YOU CAN FIND OUT HOW TO BUY TICKETS AT
cbnnews.com. GORDON?
>> Gordon: WELL, RESIDENTS ACROSS NORTH
CAROLINA ARE STILL TRYING TO REBUILD IN THE WAKE OF
HURRICANE FLORENCE. BUT MANY ARE FINDING THAT
THE TASK IS TOO GREAT FOR THEM TO DO ALONE.
JUDY NELSON IS A WIDOW WHO'S HOUSE WAS FILLED
WITH MOLD. NO ONE COULD HELP HER
UNTIL SHE MET AN ARMY FROM "OPERATION BLESSING."
>> Reporter: WHEN HURRICANE FLORENCE HIT
NEWBURN, NORTH CAROLINA, AND FLOODED JUDY NELSON'S
HOME, SHE HAD NOWHERE TO TURN FOR HELP.
>> I'M A WIDOW. MY BROTHERS ARE ALL OLDER
THAN ME. THEY CAN'T HELP ME.
I DON'T HAVE A LOT OF YOUNG FAMILY MEMBERS HERE.
AND THEN THE ONES THAT I DO HAVE, THEY CAN'T LEAVE
THEIR JOBS TO COME HERE AND HELP ME, EVEN THOUGH
THEY MAY WANT TO. >> Reporter: THE
DEVASTATION WAS SO GREAT, AND THERE WERE SO MANY
FAMILIES WHO NEEDED HELP, JUDY KNEW ONLY GOD COULD
PROVIDE. >> IF YOU LIVE BY GOD'S
COVENANT AND PUT GOD FIRST, HE'LL BE RIGHT
THERE FOR YOU. AND I KNOW THAT.
>> Reporter: THEN A VOLUNTEER TEAM FROM
>> I KNEW GOD HAD NOT FORGOTTEN ME.
HE SENT PEOPLE WHEN I NEEDED THEM THE MOST.
I NEEDED NEW WALLS AND FLOORS, AND IT WAS RIGHT
ON TIME. SO HE IS RIGHT ON TIME.
>> Reporter: SO JUDY'S INSURANCE WILL COVER THE
COST OF REPLACING THE CONTENTS OF HER HOUSE, BUT
WHAT THEY WON'T COVER IS THE COST OF TEARING THE
OLD DRYWALL OUT. SO WE'RE HERE TO HELP.
"OPERATION BLESSING" GOT RIGHT TO WORK.
WE TORE UP THE OLD FLOORING AND CUT OUT THAT
DRYWALL THAT WAS ALREADY STARTING TO MOLD.
>> I CAN'T DO IT. I WAS RESCUED.
I KNEW IT WAS GOD SENDING Y'ALL TO ME.
>> Reporter: WHEN OUR WORK WAS DONE, OUR
VOLUNTEERS TOOK THE TIME TO PRAY WITH JUDY.
NOW SHE CAN BEGIN TO TAKE THOSE FIRST STEPS TOWARDS
RECOVERY. >> Y'ALL WERE THE CAVALRY.
THE ONLY THING YOU DIDN'T HAVE WAS A WHITE HORSE AND
A HORN. BUT YOU HAD "OPERATION
BLESSING," AND THAT WAS THE BEST UNIFORM.
THEY CAME WHEN I NEEDED THEM.
THANK YOU, LORD. >> Gordon: BE A PART OF
IT. THE STORM HAS PASSED.
THE FLOODWATERS ARE NOW FINALLY RECEDING.
BUT WHAT IS LEFT IS STILL A DISASTER.
IF YOU WANT TO HELP, WE'VE GOT A SPECIAL FUND FOR
YOU. ALL YOU HAVE TO DO IS CALL
US: 1-800-700-7000. SAY, I WANT TO GIVE TO THE
"OPERATION BLESSING" DISASTER RELIEF FUND.
YOU CAN WRITE TO US, CBN CENTER, VIRGINIA BEACH,
VIRGINIA, 23463, OR YOU CAN GO TO THE WEBSITE AND
GIVE ON cbn.com. BE A PART OF IT:
1-800-700-7000. AND AS YOU SAW, THE RELIEF
EFFORTS IN NORTH CAROLINA ARE ONGOING, AND
"OPERATION BLESSING" NEEDS VOLUNTEERS.
WE'LL BE ACCEPTING VOLUNTEERS AT THE "WITHOUT
LIMITS CHRISTIAN CENTER" IN NEWBURN, NORTH
CAROLINA. WE'LL BE ACCEPTING
VOLUNTEERS MONDAY THROUGH SATURDAY -- WE DO HAVE
SUNDAY OFF -- AND WE'LL PROVIDE FREE LUNCH, AND
FREE HOUSING IS ALSO AVAILABLE IF YOU'RE OUT OF
TOWN AND YOU WANT TO VOLUNTEER.
BUT IF YOU'RE OUT OF TOWN, YOU HAVE TO REGISTER IN
ADVANCE. CALL 1-800-677-7974.
THAT'S FOR VOLUNTEERS. THERE IS MORE INFORMATION
ABOUT IT AT ob.org. IF YOU WANT TO VOLUNTEER
AND HELP PEOPLE -- IT'S TOUGH WORK, IT IS HOT
WORK, IT IS DIFFICULT WORK, BUT IF YOU WANT TO
DO IT, YOU'LL SEE THE GRATITUDE OF PEOPLE FACE
TO FACE. AND YOU CAN HEAR THEM SAY,
YOU'VE COME TO ME AND YOU'RE LIKE THE RESCUER
FOR ME. DO IT NOW.
BE A PART OF IT. >> Terry: COMING UP, THE
MIRACLE BOY WHO SURVIVED AFTER BEING IMPALED IN THE
FACE BY A MEAT SKEWER. >> HE GOES, I'M DYING,
MOM. AND I GO, NO, YOU'RE NOT.
AND HE GOES, I WANT TO SEE JESUS, BUT NOT RIGHT NOW.
AND I GO, IT'S OKAY, BABY, JESUS IS HERE WITH US.
>> Terry: SEE THE ONE IN A MILLION SHOT THAT SAVED
HIS LIFE. THAT'S NEXT.
>> Gordon: XAVIER CUNNINGHAM WAS PLAYING
OUTSIDE WHEN HE FELL ON TO A METAL SKEWER.
AND THAT SKEWER WENT THROUGH HIS FACE, WENT
THROUGH SKIN AND BONE, ALL THE WAY TO THE BACK OF HIS
SKULL. AND, BELIEVE THIS, JUST
THREE DAYS AFTER SURGERY, DOCTORS SENT HIM HOME WITH
A CLEAN BILL OF HEALTH. JOHN JESSUP TRAVELLED TO
MISSOURI TO TALK TO THE BOY DOCTORS DESCRIBE AS A
MEDICAL MARVEL. >> Reporter: I WANT YOU
TO MEET 11-YEAR-OLD XAVIER CUNNINGHAM.
HE HAS THIS AMAZING STORY THAT HE, HIS FAMILY AND
FRIENDS, WILL SUM UP WITH ONE OTHER WORD, WHICH
IS... >> MIRACLE.
>> Reporter: HE LOVES FOOTBALL, PLAYING
OUTDOORS, AND SPENDING TIME WITH HIS FRIENDS.
THAT ALL CAME CLOSE TO ENDING EARLIER THIS MONTH
AFTER A NEARLY FATAL ACCIDENT.
>> I WAS THE LAST ONE IN. >> Reporter: IT ALL
STARTED AT THIS TREE HOUSE IN HIS BACKYARD, WHERE A
SWARM OF YELLOW JACKETS ATTACKED HIM AND HIS
FRIENDS. IN THE RUSH TO ESCAPE,
XAVIER TRIPPED AND FELL, LANDING ON TO A MEAT
SKEWER THEY HAD FOUND EARLIER.
>> I FELT THIS BURNING PAIN RIGHT IN THIS AREA.
I WAS THERE FOR ABOUT 30 SECONDS, JUST SCREAMING MY
HEAD OFF. >> Reporter: SOMEHOW HE
MANAGED TO GET BACK HOME TO HIS MOM.
>> HE HAD THIS METAL LOOKING ROD, WHAT I
THOUGHT IT WAS AN ARROW, COMING OUT OF HIS CHEEK
HERE. >> SHE WAS, LIKE, OH, MY
GOSH, WHO DID THIS TO YOU? >> Reporter: GABRIELLE
RUSHED HER SON TO THE E.M.WITH THE SKEWER STILL
IN HIS FACE. >> HE LOOKS OVER AND GOES,
I'M DYING, MOM. AND I GO, NO, YOU'RE NOT.
YOU'RE GOING TO BE JUST FINE.
AND HE GOES, NO, I CAN FEEL IT.
AND HE GOES, I WANT TO SEE JESUS, BUT NOT RIGHT NOW.
AND I GO, IT'S OKAY, BABY, JESUS IS HERE WITH US.
>> Reporter: ULTIMATELY, THEY WERE SENT TO THE
UNIVERSITY OF KANSAS HOSPITAL WHILE THEY WAITED
AS A TEAM OF 100 MEDICAL STAFF ASSEMBLED FOR THE
RISKY PROCEDURE. >> THERE WAS A LOT OF
CONVERSATION IF WE SHOULD MAKE AN INCISION IN THE
BACK OF HIS HEAD. >> Reporter:
MIRACULOUSLY, IT MISSED HIS BRAIN, SPINAL CORD,
AND MAJOR BLOOD VESSELS BY ONLY A MILLIMETER.
>> IF IT HIT THE CAROTID ARTERY, I THINK HE
PROBABLY WOULD HAVE HAD SUCH DRAMATIC BLEEDING IN
SUCH A SHORT AMOUNT OF TIME, IT WOULD HAVE CLOSED
OFF HIS AIRWAY AND HE WOULDN'T HAVE SURVIVED IT.
>> Reporter: DOCTORS COMMANDED XAVIER FOR
KEEPING CALM. THEY SAY THE ODDS OF
MISSING CRITICAL ORGANS WAS ONE IN A MILLION AND
EXPECT A FULL RECOVERY. >> FATHER, WE LOVE YOU.
>> Reporter: CBN SAW HIM TWO DAYS AFTER HIS RELEASE
FROM THE HOSPITAL. WE CHRONICLED HIS FIRST
OUTING AT THE HARRISONVILLE FOOTBALL
FIELD, WHERE HE HOPES ONE DAY TO BE PART OF THE
TEAM. OUR CAMERAS ALSO FOLLOWED
HIM ON HIS FIRST SUNDAY BACK TO CHURCH, WHERE AN
ENTIRE COMMUNITY RALLIED TO PRAY FOR HIM.
DURING THE VISIT, WE TALKED ABOUT THE
EXPERIENCE. CAN I ASK YOU SOMETHING
REAL QUICK? HOW DID YOU KNOW NOT TO
TAKE IT OUT? DID YOU THINK ABOUT IT?
>> I WATCHED BLACK PANTHERS, AND AT THE END
OF IT, HOW HE TAKES IT OUT AND DIES, AND SO I WAS,
LIKE, NOPE. * THE OVERWHELMING,
NEVER-ENDING, OVERWHEL RECKLESS LOVE *
>>> Reporter: I KNOW THERE WAS A SONG --
>> "RECKLESS LOVE"... >> Reporter: WHY DID YOU
KEEP SINGING IT OR ASKING FOR IT TO BE PLAYED?
>> BECAUSE OUR FIRST TIME AT THAT CHURCH, THAT'S ONE
OF THE FIRST SONGS WE LISTENED TO.
AND I WAS, LIKE, THIS IS A GOOD SONG.
>> Reporter: XAVIER'S PARENTS ARE GRATEFUL THEIR
SON IS ALIVE, AND THAT LIFE IS RETURNING TO
NORMAL. THEY ALSO KNOW THEIR
FAMILY HAS AN AMAZING TESTIMONY ABOUT GIVING
GLORY TO GOD. >> GOD CREATED THOSE
DOCTORS TO DO PHENOMENAL THINGS.
BUT THERE COMES A POINT WHERE WE COME TO THE END
OF OURSELVES. AND THIS IS WHERE WE WERE.
NO MAN COULD CHANGE THIS. ONLY THE GOD OF HEAVEN.
>> EVERY DAY, JUST SEEING A MIRACLE IN MY HOUSE.
I MEAN, HE IS. HE IS A LIVING, WALKING
MIRACLE. THE HAND OF GOD WAS ON MY
SON. >> Reporter: THAT
MIRACLE HAS STRENTHENED XAVIER'S FAITH, TOO.
>> WHEN YOU'RE GETTING TO KNOW JESUS, YOU'RE, LIKE,
OH, HE SAVED US AND GAVE HIS LIFE FOR US.
AND AFTER THIS, IT'S JUST LIKE HE TRULY IS THE GOD
ALMIGHTY. >> Reporter: WE POINTED
OUT, JUST LIKE JESUS, HE NOW HAS VISIBLE SCARS.
PROBABLY RIGHT NOW YOU'RE NOT THINKING THAT THEY'RE
BEAUTIFUL, BUT DO YOU THINK THAT MAYBE GOD CAN
MAKE THEM BEAUTIFUL? >> HE CAN MAKE EVERYTHING
BEAUTIFUL. >> Reporter: JOHN
JESSUP, CBN NEWS, IN HARRISONVILLE, MISSOURI.
>> Gordon: THAT WAS AN INCREDIBLE STORY.
GIVE A SHOUT OUT TO BLACK PANTHER AND THE
PRODUCER -- YOU SAVED A BOY'S LIFE BY SHOWING HIM
WHATNOT TO DO. >> Terry: AND I THINK OF
THAT SCRIPTURE THAT SAYS, BEFORE WE HAVE HEARD OF
YOU, BUT NOW WE SEE YOU. >> Gordon: NOW WE SEE
YOU. >> Terry: AMAZING.
>> Gordon: JUST THE HONESTY, I WANT TO SEE
JESUS BUT NOT RIGHT NOW. >> Terry: I THINK A LOT
OF US KIND OF FEEL THAT WAY, RIGHT?
>> Gordon: I THINK IT IS UNIVERSAL.
[LAUGHTER] >> Terry: UP NEXT, A
SINGLE MOM WHO WAS LIVING IN A HOTEL ROOM WITH
NOTHING BUT HER DAUGHTER AND A DRUG HABIT.
>> I THOUGHT TO MYSELF, THIS IS HOW I'M GOING TO
HAVE TO LIVE THE REST OF MY LIFE, EVERY DAY FOR THE
REST OF MY LIFE. >> Terry: HEAR HOW SHE
BROKE THE CYCLE OF ADDICTION, WHEN WE COME
BACK. >> Gordon: MONICA HILL
LOST HER JOB OVER HER DRUG HABIT, WHICH WAS NO
SURPRISE SINCE SHE WORKED AT A PHARMACY AND WAS
FORGING PRESCRIPTIONS FOR HERSELF.
THROWTD HETHROUGHOUT HER LIFE, MONICA BOUNCED FROM ONE
REHAB STINT TO THE NEXT, UNTIL SHE FOUND THE WAY TO
BREAK THE CYCLE WEBSITE ONCE AND FOR ALL.
>> Reporter: FOR YEARS MONICA HILL LIED TO HER
